column1: '''Calacirian''' was a region of [[Eldamar]] near the entrance to the ravine of [[Calacirya]]. The hill of [[Túna]] stood there
column2: with the city of [[Tirion]] built upon it. The light of the [[Two Trees]] was the strongest there in all Eldamar.

column1: The name appears in [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo's]] [[Song of Eärendil]] in [[Rivendell]]:<ref>{{FR|II1}}</ref><ref name=RGEO>{{RGEO|Notes}}

column2:
as through the Calacirian
to hidden land forlorn he went.''

column1: The [[Quenya]] name ''Calacirian'' is a simplified ("anglicized") form of ''Kalakiryan'' (full ''Kalakiryandë''
